metadata.synopsis: Dialog for gnome foreman on the other side of the ebon lake after they were saved by player. Mentions the other gnomes being kept at moonrise towers.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto -634, 15, 3104. Ctrl+Shift+K the Cave-In (Nere will speak to you automatically)5. Select dialogue options "Stop! No more...", "I act on...", "You wouldn't dare...", then "You so much..."6. killcombat7. Speak with Beldron

0.speaker: Beldron
0.text: We're moving on. There's... there's nothing left for us here.

1.speaker: Beldron
1.text: I knew little Thulla would survive all this. But... not like that.

2.speaker: Beldron
2.text: Never thought I'd owe a bunch o' mushrooms my life. Only wish the rest of my people were here.

3.speaker: Beldron
3.text: What a bloodbath. Safer here than in Grymforge though, no doubt about it.

4.speaker: Beldron
4.text: Thanks again for offing that drow. Only made it here 'cause of you. But I can't stop thinking about the rest of us...

5.speaker: Beldron
5.text: ... stuck in Moonrise with a bunch of sadists. Poor bastards.
